ComicInfo.Summary: The Black Angel takes Christopher to the top of the World Trade Center in New York where he resurrects the four horsemen of the apocalypse. Michael and Mary attempt to rescue Gabrielle who has been strung up and tortured by Trickle. They succeed but Mike is badly wounded and Gaby gives up the rest of her angelic powers as well as her life to heal her ex-husband. Allies arrive to help out their pal, Deathblow.
